title: Stone into steel
creator_credit: A. Frank Bundy, United Steel Companies, Wallace Productions and Paul Dickson
brief_description: Impressions of a large modern steel works which tell, without dialogue, the story of the making of steel from ironstone. The lives of the steelworkers themselves are also explored.
creator_credit_for_label: A. Frank Bundy, United Steel Companies, Wallace Productions and Paul Dickson
description: Impressions of a large modern steel works which tell, without dialogue, the story of the making of steel from ironstone. The lives of the steelworkers themselves are also explored.
